abstract: The company’s revenue dropped 6 percent and its profits by 32 percent compared with the same quarter last year.
snippet: The company’s revenue dropped 6 percent and its profits by 32 percent compared with the same quarter last year.
lead_paragraph: Fresh off one of the worst quarters in company history, Microsoft offered investors little evidence that a beleaguered personal computer market would recover anytime soon.

headline.main: Microsoft Profit Falls for First Time in 23 Years
headline.print_headline: PC Sales Off, Profit Falls At Microsoft
